subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Spanish news media has reported that the former Barcelona coach Tito Vilanova is in a hospital again because of a recurrence of the throat cancer he has been fighting for more than two years.
snippet: The Spanish news media has reported that the former Barcelona coach Tito Vilanova is in a hospital again because of a recurrence of the throat cancer he has been fighting for more than two years.
